active_learning.discussion_prompt: Debate the trade-offs of using Android Emulators versus physical devices in penetration testing. When do emulators fail security tests (e.g., emulator detection by apps, inaccurate hardware sensors)? Provide real-world examples from OWASP MASTG and justify scenarios where one is preferable.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.
